segments.text: I'm really noticing the details of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just flowing relentlessly over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet, almost mesmerizing in its flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is quite wide now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted by the waste of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the damage it must be doing to the cabinets is concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's serene expression is truly baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so calmly drying that plate, utterly undisturbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit angry that she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These things are happening right around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a sad sight to see such a simple task turn into a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The gentle light from the window almost highlights the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just shake my head at the whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She really needs to open her eyes to what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
